mapper.select: select a.user_id,a.user_name, a.user_type,a.employee_no,a.org_seq,a.tel,a.email,a.`password` from t_user_info a LEFT join t_user_login_info b on a.user_id =b.user_id where a.`status`=1 and a.tel=#{tel} and a.`password`=#{password}

select a.user_id,a.user_name, a.user_type,a.employee_no,a.org_seq,a.tel,a.email, (select area_id from t_user_organization where org_seq = a.org_seq),a.real_name, b.auth_method, b.account,a.wrong_count,a.is_lock,a.lock_time from t_user_info a inner join ( select user_id,auth_method,account from t_user_auth_method b where account = #{authId} ) as b on b.user_id = a.user_id where a.password = #{password} and a.status = 1
mapper.update: update t_user_info set login_time = #{loginTime} where user_id = #{userId}
update t_user_info set wrong_count = #{wrongCount} where user_id = #{userId}
update t_user_info set wrong_count = #{wrongCount},is_lock= #{isLock},lock_time = #{lockTime} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT b.org_seq ,b.org_name,a.user_type,b.org_type,c.doorway_pic,c.open_status FROM t_user_org_relation AS a LEFT JOIN (SELECT org_seq,MIN(user_type) user_type FROM t_user_org_relation WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY org_seq ) t ON a.user_type = t.user_type AND a.org_seq = t.org_seq INNER JOIN t_user_organization AS b ON b.org_seq = a.org_seq left join t_user_store_info c on a.org_seq=c.org_seq WHERE a.status = 1 and b.status =1 and a.user_id = #{userId} AND t.user_type IS NOT NULL
SELECT b.role_id,b.role_name FROM t_user_user_role_relation AS a INNER JOIN t_user_role AS b ON b.role_id = a.role_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT a.user_id,b.user_name,d.user_type,a.org_seq,b.tel,b.email,b.real_name,c.org_name,c.org_type FROM t_user_login_info a LEFT JOIN t_user_info b ON a.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user_organization c ON a.org_seq = c.org_seq LEFT JOIN t_user_org_relation d ON a.org_seq = d.org_seq AND a.user_id = d.user_id WHERE a.auth_code = #{authId} AND a.password = #{password} and a.status=1 ORDER BY d.user_type LIMIT 1

SELECT a.user_id,b.user_name,d.user_type,a.org_seq,b.tel,b.email,b.real_name,c.org_name,c.org_type FROM t_user_login_info a LEFT JOIN t_user_info b ON a.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user_organization c ON a.org_seq = c.org_seq LEFT JOIN t_user_org_relation d ON a.org_seq = d.org_seq AND a.user_id = d.user_id WHERE b.tel=#{tel} and a.status=1 ORDER BY d.user_type LIMIT 1
SELECT a.user_id FROM t_user_info a LEFT JOIN t_user_login_info b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE a.tel = #{phone} AND b.auth_code = #{authId} LIMIT 1
